LanguageData.GuestBeds.label: Camas de invitados
LanguageData.GuestBeds.helptext: Visitors prefer to sleep in beds.\n\nThere are specific guest beds you can build for them.
LanguageData.RecruitGuest.label: Camas de reclutamiento
LanguageData.RecruitGuest.helptext: You can recruit guests.\n\nRecruiting a guest will cost you goodwill with the guest's faction. Make sure you have a colonist with good social skills assigned for negotiation.
